description: Largest prime preceding distinct values of LCM[1,...,m]: Max{p|p < A003418[A000961(n)]. To get different LCM values, the last arguments(m) of LCM were selected from A000961.
example: LCM[1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8]=840 is the 7th in A000961. It is preceded backward by 839,829,..primes.So the corresponding prime in this sequence is 839. The first 2 entries come before LCM[1]=1 and LCM[1,2]=2 as 1-3=-2 and 2-4=-2.
author: _Labos Elemer_, Nov 15 2000
